section.title: Superlative adjectives
section.sectiontitle: Use superlative adjectives to compare one thing with all the others in a group.
section.text1a: This house is the biggest house in the street.
section.text2a: The blue shoes are the most expensive shoes in the shop.
section.sectiontitle2: The superlative of regular one-syllable adjectives is adjective + -est. We usually use the before a superlative adjective.
section.text3a: The cat's the oldest animal on the farm.
section.text4a: Newspapers are the cheapest way of getting news.

section.title: Superlative adjectives
section.sectiontitle: Use the most + adjective with longer adjectives.
section.text1a: Movie stars are the most famous people in the world.
section.text2a: This book is the most interesting one on my bookshelves.
